Row.Text: "We sat down and conversation ensued. We then arose and passed on."
"Here all work is laid aside, while nothing but pleasure becomes the order of the day."
"If there be no war in paradise, how can there be any delights there?"
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Land Military Units for every 2 Settlements under the [icon:SETTLEMENT_LIMIT] Settlement Limit.
+10 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital for every Settlement under the [icon:SETTLEMENT_LIMIT] Settlement Limit.
When you support an [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavor, gain 200 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and the other Leader gains 100 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. (On Standard Speed)
+15 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements for every [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commander stationed on a [icon:CITY_URBAN] District there.
+0.5 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for every [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital.
+10 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science and [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital for every Settlement under the [icon:SETTLEMENT_LIMIT] Settlement Limit.
